allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: LHIMS data extraction system for VRH Hohoe

Set up automated data extraction system to retrieve patient data
from LHIMS before facility lockout.

Features:
- Network traffic capture and analysis tools
- Automated OPD and IPD data extraction scripts
- Comprehensive documentation and guides
- Security: credentials and patient data excluded from repository

Components:
- Playwright-based network capture scripts
- HAR file analysis tools
- OPD register extraction (template)
- IPD morbidity & mortality extraction (template)
- Complete setup and usage documentation

Security:
- All credentials removed from committed scripts
- Patient data directories excluded via .gitignore
- Network captures excluded
- Analysis files excluded

EOF
)")
